dataObject.content: Populist Interior Minister Matteo Salvini has slammed Saudi Arabia, the host of the Italian football Super Cup, for not allowing single women to attend the match without a man accompanying them.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"Appears just to be reporting, the use of the word \"slammed\" is somewhat inflammatory but not necessarily biased."}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"There is a bit of a misnomer in the language choice of slamming. I feel this is somewhat subjective and more opinion-based than factual."}
